ScavengerNest.Description:
Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources.

Enables:
- Scavengers
ScavengerNest.Name: Scavenger Nest

Scavenger.Description:
Basic builder and worker unit.

Can attack ground units.
Scavenger.Name: Scavenger

FeedingPool.Description:
Provides supply.
Supply allows you to create more units.
Boosts the production of nearby structures and heals nearby units.
FeedingPool.Name: Feeding Pool

Siphoner.Description: Formed over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
Siphoner.Name: Siphoner

XayidDen.Description:
Creates larva, which are in turn used to mutate various basic creatures.

Enables:
- Xayidlings
- Roamers
- Bile Pits from Scavengers
XayidDen.Name: Xayid Den

Worm.Description: Can mutate into various Xayid ground units.
Worm.Name: Worm

XayidCocoon.Description: Xayid units morph in the safety of these cocoons.
XayidCocoon.Name: Xayid Cocoon

Xayidling.Description:
Mid-ranged fighter.

Can attack ground and air units
Xayidling.Name: Xayidling

Roamer.Description:
Fast anti-light skirmisher. Can use Scour.

Can attack ground units.
Roamer.Name: Roamer

Scorpalisk.Description:
Armored melee attacker.

Can attack ground units.
Scorpalisk.Name: Scorpalisk

Mendling.Description:
Healer unit. Can use Mend, Covering Spray and Sacrificial Mutation.

Can attack ground and air units.
Mendling.Name: Mendling

SacrificialMutation.Description: Heals 100 life in an area over the lifetime of the unit.
SacrificialMutation.Name: Sacrificial Mutation

Casnolisk.Description: Armored spell caster. Can use Stagnating Bile and Explosive Glob.
Casnolisk.Name: Casnolisk

Eroder.Description:
Long ranged anti-armor beast.

Can target ground units.
Eroder.Name: Eroder

MutagenChamber.Description:
Contains weapon and armor upgrades for Xayid ground units.

Enables:
- Roamers at the Xayid Den
- Scorpalisks at the Xayid Den
- Mendlings at the Xayid Den
MutagenChamber.Name: Mutagen Chamber

BilePit.Description:
Primary defensive structure. Must be placed near a Feeding Pool or Scavenger Nest.

Can attack ground and air units.
Detector
BilePit.Name: Bile Pit

CasnoliskDen.Description:
Contains upgrades for Xayidlings, Roamers, Scorpalisks, and Mendlings.

Enables:
- Casnolisks from the Xayid Den
CasnoliskDen.Name: Casnolisk Den

BiomassHatchery.Description:
Creates larva, which can mutate into various Xayid beasts.

Enables:
- Revilers
- Ferrions
- Prowlers
- Spitters
BiomassHatchery.Name: Biomass Hatchery

Grub.Description: Can mutate into various Xayid units.
Grub.Name: Grub

Reviler.Description:
Ranged attacker.

Can attack ground and air units.
Reviler.Name: Reviler

Prowler.Description: Quick specialist unit. Can use Acid Nest and Blinding Burst.
Prowler.Name: Prowler

AcidNest.Description: Burrowed explosive mine. Deals 80 damage on contact with an enemy ground unit. Deals 35 splash damage to other enemy ground units around it.
AcidNest.Name: Acid Nest

Spitter.Description:
Long ranged beast that spits acid at enemies, dealing damage in an area. Can issue attacks to specific points on the ground

Can attack ground units.
Spitter.Name: Spitter

Massalisk.Description:
Large, low ranged durable beast with splash damage. Can use Hunker.

Can attack ground units.
Massalisk.Name: Massalisk

MassaliskHunkered.Description:
Large, low ranged durable beast with splash damage. Currently using Hunker, which gives long range anti-air capabilities.

Can attack ground and air units.
MassaliskHunkered.Name: Massalisk

BiomassCavern.Description:
Contains upgrades for Revilers, Prowlers and Spitters.

Enables:
- Massalisks at the Biomass Hatchery
BiomassCavern.Name: Biomass Cavern

AvianNest.Description:
Creates Wasps, which are mutated into Xayid flyers.

Enables:
- Raptors
- Assailants
AvianNest.Name: Avian Nest

Wasp.Description: Can mutate into various Xayid flyers.
Wasp.Name: Wasp

Raptor.Description:
Fast, weak flyer. Effective against Armored targets. Two Raptors hatch from a single egg.

Can attack ground and air units.
Raptor.Name: Raptor

Assailant.Description:
Anti-ground assault flyer. Attack missiles seek valid targets until dealing damage.

Can attack ground units.
Assailant.Name: Assailant

Exterminator.Description:
Anti-air fighter that excels vs Light targets.

Can attack air units.
Exterminator.Name: Exterminator

Xayithoan.Description:
Aerial detector and spell caster. Can use Adaptive Injection, Protective Cloud and Spawn Watcher.

Detector
Xayithoan.Name: Xayithoan

Kraken.Description:
A huge powerful beast, with a devastating attack. Can use Volatile Discharge.

Can attack ground and air units.
Kraken.Name: Kraken

VolatileDischarge.Description:
After a charge up of 10 seconds, the Volatile Discharge will explode for 200 damage in a large area. If destroyed before charge up is complete, the detonation will be cancelled.

Damages air and ground units, including friendlies.
VolatileDischarge.Name: Volatile Discharge

CatalystPit.Description:
Contains weapon and armor upgrades for Xayid fliers. Contains researches for Raptors and Xayithoans.

Enables:
- Exterminators at the Avian Nest
- Xayithoans at the Avian Nest
CatalystPit.Name: Catalyst Pit

SunkenWarren.Description:
Enables:
- Krakens at the Avian Nest
SunkenWarren.Name: Sunken Warren
